AltName.entry: INFORMATION PARTNERSHIP FOR SOUTH YORKSHIRE AND NORTH DERBYSHIRE, THE

Desc.entry: Sinto is a partnership of library and information services in the Yorkshire and East Midlands region with the goal of improving services to users through co-operation, training and planning. Membership is open to any organisation providing an information service or with an interest in librarianship and information management. Membership provides the following benefits to organisations and their staff: training and professional development events; networking and a community of practice; a framework for information planning; the South Yorkshire Access to Libraries for Learning scheme; a local document delivery service; information, advice and research; representation and advocacy. Sinto in its present form was established through a Foundation Agreement between Sheffield City Council and Sheffield Hallam University. Sinto is run by its members.
